PERSONA:
meet alex johnson, a 25-year-old high school graduate living in the metropolitan area of columbus, ohio, within the east north central division of the midwest. born and raised in the united states, alex grew up in a middle-class family with his parents and an older sister. his father worked as a mechanic, and his mother was a part-time nurse. alex's upbringing in a protestant household instilled in him strong moral values, and he regularly attends weekly church services.

after graduating from high school, alex did not pursue higher education due to financial constraints. instead, he immediately entered the workforce, taking on various low-skill jobs to support himself. currently, alex works as a forklift operator at a local warehouse, earning around $35,000 a year. he rents a small one-bedroom apartment on the outskirts of columbus for $900 per month, which takes up a significant portion of his income.

alex has never been married and does not have any children. his social life primarily revolves around his close-knit group of friends from high school, with whom he often watches sports games or goes hunting. despite not being extremely active in politics, alex identifies as a republican and leans moderate in his ideology, mainly due to his upbringing and influence from his conservative family.

alex is concerned about the current state of the economy, worrying about the rising costs of living and the lack of opportunities for career advancement. he is enthusiastic about politicians who focus on creating jobs and improving the livelihoods of working-class individuals. however, his strong christian values also shape his stance on social issues, making him conservative on certain matters such as abortion.

given his economic circumstances, alex is interested in policies that aim to reduce income inequality and provide better access to affordable healthcare. he is not very familiar with the details of various policy proposals but tends to support candidates who emphasize fairness and equal opportunities. in his free time, alex is an avid internet user, often browsing news websites and social media platforms to stay informed about current events.

as a registered voter, alex is certain to participate in upcoming elections and have a voice in shaping the future of his community. his unique blend of economic concerns and conservative values will influence his voting decisions, making him a crucial demographic in the midwest region.
